COST.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, EffectController() ) filter:NotTargetted()

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_SPIRIT_1_1_F_277469", token_count, EffectController() ) end
